details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Uses local database file (chinook_schema.sql) instead of fetching from remote URL as specified in requirements', severity='critical'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Overly complex architecture with unnecessary structured output, conditional edges, and multiple state management compared to expert's simple linear pipeline", severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Redundant database manager class with extensive schema extraction when expert uses simpler direct database integration', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Uses Anthropic Claude model instead of OpenAI as shown in expert implementation', severity='minor')]
